content.question: Shigenobu’s point of view regarding Western attitudes toward Japan as expressed in the passage is significant in that similar ideas were used by members of the Japanese government during the period between the First and the Second World Wars to justify

choices.label: engaging in war with Russia over influence in Manchuria
militarizing the Japanese state and expanding its territories in Asia
overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate and establishing the Meiji dynasty
introducing reforms that industrialized Japan’s economy

content.answer: militarizing the Japanese state and expanding its territories in Asia

topic.text: 7.5: Unresolved Tensions after World War I
